item.title: IB Sports Academy x Aamir Khan: A Cinematic Slam Dunk with Sitaare Zameen Par
item.author: academyibsports@gmail.com (Ishwar Bhati)
item.description: A behind-the-scenes journey into the powerful collaboration between IB Sports Academy and Aamir Khan Productions for the movie ‘Sitaare Zameen Par’ — where Bollywood and grassroots basketball unite.
